name: Ecorobotical
description:
You are a a lonely robot who has to save the last plant on the planet. You have too short hands to carry it, so instead you have to push it on a cart. Navigate through variety of obstacles to deliver the flower to the plant terminal. 

Controls WSAD or ARROW KEYS
Watch out with the speed, cart suspension is very sensitive. 

Game Contains 10 LEVELS
There is a TIMER in each level, you can compare the best time against your previous results which are saved. 
Level progression is also saved.

Made with unity.
